title: If you could delete your account...
body:
...and get all your money back, would you?

Personally, I wish I could. I love the concept of the game, but mother of God, is it a magnet for absolute assholes. Regardless of any game mode, Co-Op vs AI, ARAM, ARURF, etc, somehow we get these jerks. Now, I'm pretty thick skinned, but it gets tiring after game after game of these punks. I honestly regret spending so much money on this game. I could have a super computer by now (GTX 1080 Ti, Intel i7/i9, etc) but instead my dumb little ass decided to spend so much on cosmetics because they're cute. 

At this point, I really don't know if I'll play League much at all. I'm not moving to Overwatch because the game jerks that left here went there and made it 100% worse.  I put so many years into this game and it'd suck to let it go, but I'm really torn.
